channel.title: Your favorite War and Apocalypse movies?
channel.description: I have time to waste over the next couple days. Post your favorite War and Apocalypse movies.

item.title: Your favorite War and Apocalypse movies?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

For a war series I would have to say WW2 in HD, for a movie Saving Private Ryan is good and black hawk down, for an apolitical movie I have to say Armageddon wins for me.

Read full topic

item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:7, topic:446176”]War -Saving Private Ryan
The opening sequence was truely amazing and gave one of the best visuals that could be created of such a horror

Apoc - the walking dead
Not a movie, but a great show that I highly recommended to any zombie apoc fan.[/quote]This.

The Road for Apoc.

item.title: Your favorite War and Apocalypse movies?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

IMDb

Where Eagles Dare (1968)

Directed by Brian G. Hutton. With Richard Burton, Clint Eastwood, Mary Ure, Patrick Wymark. Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding an American General prisoner... but that's not all that's really going on.

One of the best war-movies ever made.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite War and Apocalypse movies?
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:3, topic:446176”]Zombieland

Na there is a serious one i’ve seen but I forgot the name so I will edit this later with it. It’s on my on demand somewhere.

EDIT: still looking for that movie but some of these look good: http://www.geeksugar.com/Best-Apocalypse-Movies-18595675

EDIT2: The movie I was thinking of was The Crazies. It’s not really the end of the world but it’s kinda scary and is still in that general category.[/quote]
I’m going to try and get The Signal. Sounds pretty gory though.
